title: O Happy Day, That Fixed My Choice

verses.html:
1
O happy day, that fixed my choice On Thee, my Saviour and my God!
Well may this glowing heart rejoice, And tell its raptures all abroad.

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Happy day, happy day, When Jesus washed my sins away!
He taught me how to watch and pray, And live rejoicing ev’ry day;
Happy day, happy day, When Jesus washed my sins away!

2
’Tis done the great transaction’s done; I am my Lord’s, and He is mine;
He drew me and I followed on, Rejoiced to own the call divine.

2

Happy day, happy day, When Jesus washed my sins away!

3
Now rest, my long divided heart, Fixed on this blissful center, rest;
Here have I found a nobler part, Here heav’nly pleasures fill my breast.

4
High heav’n that hears the solemn vow, That vow renewed shall daily hear;
Till in life’s latest hour I bow, And bless, in death, a bond so dear.
